scripts.build: yarn --cwd ui install && yarn --cwd ui build
scripts.dev: yarn build && yarn database:migrate --local && yarn wrangler pages dev ui/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist
scripts.test:ui: yarn build && yarn database:migrate --local && concurrently --kill-others "yarn wrangler pages dev ui/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist --port 6868" "yarn --cwd ui jest --verbose"
scripts.deploy:init: wrangler pages project create wildebeest && wrangler d1 create wildebeest
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn database:migrate && yarn wrangler pages publish ui/dist --project-name=wildebeest
